Option Masters tutorial 25.07:BPT idea: On earning day, Gold miner stock fells. Expects rebound with Put + protection NB: NEM @45.20 at time of the trade Idée BPT/OFI. The idea is that NEM is so oversold (very close to covid lows), we believe a bounce is imminent in the near future. Therefore, buying ITM allowed us to grab huge income plus the IV are high because of the crash we got post-earnings announcement. This is why we bought a short term hedge with it in case the stock does start dropping, we can limit our losses and exit the trade entirely. ALso selling Put long term is like selling covered calls + long stock. => The reaction has not materialized yet (4 months later, 26.11) despite Pat's analysis on previous stock movement. Remarque: Sizing is too big. I have been too greedy, looking at pric drop. Another possibility would have been to sell calls. It seems the drop was much more violent than previous drops and could not be compared with them. The stock was struck like by a hammer.
